text: Juan Caviglia (born 16 June 1997) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Sarmiento. ==Career== Caviglia's career got underway in the senior ranks of Sarmiento, who signed him from Mariano Moreno de Junín in 2014.
